name: Salvocean - #138
shortDescription: Let Your Worries Fade Away! Oceanfront, Salvo- Hot Tub, Beach Gear, Dog-Friendly
longDescription:
OCEANFRONT Salvo- Colony Dr. - Imagine the ocean and dunes for as far as you can see - a place of refuge and a home for making memories with family and friends. This is SALVOCEAN, a house built for escaping the world. The ground level has a concrete driveway, carport, and all weather entry/playroom with bunk bed. The second level has three bedrooms (one master with a private bath and two with a shared bath), and entertainment area with a TV and streaming service. The third level has another master suite and a great room with a 42” flat screen TV. The great room is open and airy with cathedral ceiling, juniper paneling, and lots of windows that provide excellent ocean views and opens to a furnished sundeck and large shaded porch with table and chairs for outdoor dining or taking in beautiful sunrises and spectacular sunsets. Every bedroom has its own television, so whether you prefer to watch tv, play games or read there is space for it for all. Perhaps a dip in the hot tub is just what you need! Salvocean is a sanctuary in a wonderful neighborhood where you can walk, bike or visit the local ice cream store. It is a simple place, where you can relax and enjoy miles of sand and sea, whether you’re walking with your pets or casting a rod to the surf. Come see for yourself what a true Hatteras Island home is like at SALVOCEAN.
| New for 2024: Screened porch has been changed into a shaded porch. Relax in the shade and feel the Hatteras Island breezes while you take in the natural beauty. New furniture in the great room including a new sofa, chairs, lighting and new home décor.

| (2 masters) 1 king, 1 king, 1 queen, 2 single, 1 set of bunks

Full linens including sheets (with beds made), bath towels, hand towels, washcloths provided May 23 - September 4, 2026. name: Moonglade - #1
shortDescription:
OCEANFRONT Avon- Kinnakeet Shores  Steps from the beach, your family will be amazed by MOONGLADE's easy access and spectacular ocean views. The interior decor is impressive, especially in the great room with hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings and 55" high definition 4K Sony TV with sound bar. Floor-to-ceiling windows afford panoramic ocean views from this home located in one of the most desirable communities on Hatteras Island. Expansive oceanfront and soundside decks with plenty of deck furniture make for great family get-togethers at sunrise or sunset. This home is beautifully cared for with many personal touches, from ceramic tile in all bathrooms to classic coastal decor. Nothing has been overlooked for your guests. The game room with pool table, mini-refrigerator, ice machine, beautiful glass block windows and stylish, comfortable family seating enhance your enjoyment while watching the 55" high definition 4K Sony TV. All bedrooms face the ocean with their own private entrance; just open a window and enjoy the endless sound of ocean waves! Top floor features include a gourmet kitchen, gas-log fireplace, powder room, master bedroom and master bath with an extra-large shower. Wireless internet is available for your convenience. This home’s great location is only a short walk to the Avon Pier and is across Route 12 from the Food Lion grocery store, shopping, restaurants and a pharmacy. Privacy, comfort and luxury are all amenities reflective of the private home that this is in the off-season. Add in MOONGLADE magic and you'll make beach memories to last a lifetime!
 
(3 masters) 1 king, 1 king, 1 king, 2 sets of bunks, 2 single    |
Non-smoking
- 6 Satellite TVs (2- 55" Sony 4KTVs) 
- DVD player
- Free long distance calling (in continental US)
- Game room with pool table, mini-fridge, ice machine and microwave
- Fireplace - gas log 
- Grill - charcoal 
- 2 Outdoor showers - enclosed
- Jacuzzi 
-Electronic keyless door lock
- Wireless high speed internet access  
- Full linens (with beds made) and towels provided May 23 - September 4th, 2020  
- Community swimming pool and tennis courts 
- 6 Person hot tub
- Pets not permitted

name: Carolina Coastin' - #101
shortDescription:
SEMI-OCEANFRONT Waves- Sea Isle Hills Dr.   Go CAROLINA COASTIN' this year in this lovely home just one lot back from the ocean and a short walk to shopping, restaurants and world-class watersports. The perfect size for a small group, this home features four master bedrooms, each with private baths. Entertain yourselves with a game of pool or foosball in the game room, or sit in front of the great room's 47" flat screen TV to watch your favorite movie. Take a dip in the 12' x 24' private swimming pool, or relax in the 6 person hot tub. Use the convenient external lift to bring up your heavy luggage and groceries. With all that this beach home has to offer, this vacation decision is an easy one.  |
New for 2020: Now offering Full linens (with beds made) and towels provided May 23 - September 4, 2020 House now has keyless entry. New in 2019: New flooring in the great room, mid level hallway, and tower room. 
 |

name: Ms. Charlotte's Place - #105
shortDescription:
OCEANSIDE Frisco- Robin Lane If you're searching for the exceptional, with gracious style gleaming with immaculate care, look no further than Ms. Charlotte's Place. Circa 1926, this completely renovated classic features all modern conveniences and is adorned with lovely antiques. Convenient outdoor shower and fish cleaning table.   |
  New for 2020: Now providing bed linens (with beds made) May 23 - September 4, 2020 (no towels). New in 2019: Remodel and new shower for the first floor bathroom. |
1 king, 1 queen, 1 queen, 2 single  |
Non-smoking

- DVD player 
- Grill - charcoal 
- Outdoor shower
-  Wireless high speed internet access 
- Bed linens provided (with beds made) May 23 - September 4, 2020 (no towels)
- Pets not permitted 

|
longDescription:
OCEANSIDE Frisco — Robin Lane — Nestled near the serene shoreline, a charming 1926 beach cottage offers a haven of nostalgic allure amidst a sea of modern homes. At MS. CHARLOTTE’S PLACE, rustic charm meets contemporary convenience as antique furnishings harmonize with modern amenities, creating a timeless retreat where memories old and new intertwine.

Ready to accommodate your beach retreat, this four-bedroom/two-full-bath home places you on a quiet street just a short stroll to the ocean’s edge. On the ground level, there’s the extra convenience of an outdoor shower. A few steps up brings you to a classic front porch, the perfect spot to start your day with freshly brewed coffee or while away an afternoon with a good book. Step inside the sitting room and discover timeless surroundings highlighted by tasteful antiques and a wood-lined ceiling that adds extra ambient warmth. To the right, a separate den provides more modern furnishings and a Smart TV to enjoy a relaxing evening of entertainment. A large dining room with a beautiful eight-seat dining table will inspire many memorable meals to come, all easily prepared in the nicely equipped and updated kitchen. The first of the home’s bedrooms, a master king with ensuite bath is also located on this level. The remaining bedrooms — two queens and a room with two single beds — are located on the top level and served by a full hallway bath.

Take a trip back in time, but not before staying in the moment to book MS. CHARLOTTE’S PLACE today.

| New for 2024: New Smart TV. New kitchen countertops and kitchen range. | 1 king, 1 queen, 1 queen, 2 singles

shortDescription:

The steps to the beach and convenient outside showers makes for perfect beachy fun, or you can relax and soak away the day in the soothing hot tub. Experience PURE JOY as you watch the waves through the large oceanfront windows! Excellent fishing, surfing, kiteboarding and windsurfing are at your doorstep. Ample supply of videos and reading material provided for rainy days.

name: Sea Biscuit - #113
shortDescription:
OCEANVIEW Frisco - Hatterasman Satisfaction is assured when you enjoy a SEA BISCUIT. This large custom designed home features 4 bedrooms, 3 of which are king master bedrooms, plus two more full bathrooms conveniently located for easy access by everyone in the group, and a gracious top level great room with comfy furnishings, 50" flat screen TV and ample room for relaxing. Step outside and enjoy the spacious screened porch with a bubbly hot tub. Family gourmets will love the large kitchen, and the entire family can enjoy the tower level with secondary living area, fireplace, and ocean and sound views to remember all year through.
| | (3 masters) 1 king, 1 king, 1 king, 2 pyramid bunks, 2 queen sofa beds | Non-smoking - 6 Flat screen TVs (1-50") with movie and music channels - 6 DVD players - 2 Stereo/CD players - Wet bar with microwave - 2 Screened porches - Fireplace - wood - Grill - charcoal - Large lockable ground level storage -Electronic keyless door lock - Wireless high speed internet access - Linens and towels available for rent - click for details - 8 person hot tub in screened-in porch - Pets not permitted |
longDescription:
OCEANVIEW Frisco - Hatterasman - Embrace the serenity and immerse yourself in the tranquility of SEA BISCUIT, a four-bedroom, five-full-bath custom designed home tucked away on a tree-lined street, yet easily walkable to the Atlantic Ocean beach. Once your family settles in, so does the natural rhythm of a beach resort vacation. Wake up from a restful night’s sleep in one of three king master bedrooms, each with its own full bath. Two sets of bunk beds in the fourth bedroom assure the kids have a private lair to call their own. Plus, two more full bathrooms are conveniently located for easy access by everyone in the group. After you rise and shine to coffee brewing in the nicely equipped kitchen, breakfast is served at the six-seat counter. Later in the day, the 10-seat dining table hosts the family for those memorable meals you’ve been dreaming about or enjoy dinner with sunset over the sound on the adjacent screened-in porch. The cozy great room is perfect for game nights or watching your favorite shows on a 50" flat screen TV; or step outside and enjoy another spacious screened-in porch with a bubbly hot tub to lull your body into total relaxation. The pinnacle of this home’s lure? A tower level with a secondary living area, ocean and sound views your family will remember all year through. Book today and don’t let SEA BISCUIT get away.
| New for 2023: Updated bedding.
| (3 masters) 1 king, 1 king, 1 king, 2 pyramid bunks, 2 queen sofa beds

name: Flippin' Sweet - #118
shortDescription: OCEANSIDE Salvo- Colony Drive This classic BEACH HOUSE is just six lots from the ocean. A crow's nest deck offers beautiful views of the sound and is a lovely place to sit and enjoy the sunset. The uncovered decks are on the south-southwest corner for maximum sun, and the screened porch has rocking chairs for spending an old-fashioned evening on the porch. The house is bright and comfortable with an open great room, kitchen and dining area. Two bedrooms (queen, pyramid bunk & single) share a hall bath, and the master bedroom has a queen bed, TV and private bath. It's so refreshing that you'll want to come back year after year! | New for 2019: New interior paint throughout, new bedspreads for the queen bedrooms, and new dining table and chairs. New 55" TV in the great room along with new TVs in the queen master and the bunk bedroom. Updated decor and paint in both bathrooms. name: Bermuda Dunes - #12
shortDescription:
OCEANFRONT Avon- Kinnakeet Shores The flavor of the island awaits you in this enchanting retreat amid the rolling dunes. Start off your vacation with a dip in the 12' x 25' private swimming pool. An all weather entry leads to the first level with two bedrooms and a bath (the bunk room features a flat screen TV and DVD). The second level has four bedrooms and three baths, including 2 master suites (both with flat screen TVs and DVDs) that open to a shaded oceanside deck and bubbly hot tub. The third level great room with cathedral ceiling provides fantastic Atlantic views and abundant space for entertaining, dining, or just relaxing after a great day on the water. Your family will enjoy watching the flat screen TV with DVD. The fourth floor ship’s watch with wet bar, mini-fridge, and private deck will make you the envy of the beach as you enjoy some of Avon's best ocean and sound views. (Fireplace seen in pictures is not available for guest use.)

name: Stone's Surf - #124
shortDescription:
SOUNDFRONT Salvo- Dory Road Just a stone's throw to the sound (l0 yards away), where windsport adventures abound. Seductive breezes, legendary sunsets and panoramic views from the triple-level decks will entertain spectators of all ages. This home offers one of the best sailing sites on Hatteras, no crowds, no hiking to sailable water, just rig up on the grass lawn, step down the sand beach to the water and off you go. For kiteboarders, new expanded soundfront yard is large enough to rig and launch at water's edge. Kayaks and other water toys are available at the nearby watersports rental store and it's just a short three-minute walk to the ocean and beach across the road. The ground floor features two paved carports, an enclosed shower to wash off, and a half bath to save you the run upstairs. On the second floor you'll find four bedrooms, three of which have sliding glass doors opening onto a screened in deck facing the sound and those legendary sunsets. Also on this level are two full baths, one with a two person Jacuzzi, and out on the deck, the six-person hot tub. The third level features the spacious kitchen and dining area, half bath, and living room with four sliding glass doors accessing east and west-facing sundecks. A spiral staircase leads to the loft area, with its own sundeck, weather station, and 2 futon beds. (Fireplace seen in pictures is not available for guest use.)
| | 1 queen, 1 queen, 1 queen, 2 sets of bunks, 2 futon beds (loft) | Non-smoking - 4 TVs - 4 DVD players - Stereo with iPod dock - Screened deck with furniture - Grill - charcoal - Weather station - High chair, port-a-crib - Sailboard racks - Sail and kite storage areas - Outdoor shower - Jacuzzi -Electronic keyless door lock - Wireless high speed internet access - Linens and towels available for rent - click for details - 6 Person hot tub - Convenient windsports access - Pets not permitted |

name: Absolutely Shore - #13
shortDescription: OCEANFRONT Avon- Pamlico Court You can be ABSOLUTELY SHORE that you'll enjoy your vacation at this charming oceanfront home in the quiet north end of Avon. Ideal for both leisure and activity and fully equipped for your vacation enjoyment. Start your vacation off right with a dip in the private saltwater swimming pool or a leisurely soak in the 6-person hot tub. A cabana half bath is conveniently located only steps away and the large pool deck area features a Tiki bar featuring a 40" outdoor TV with swivel capabilities for excellent viewing from the hot tub and Tiki bar and full-size refrigerator nearby to supply beverages for the beach. Also on the ground level is ample parking, a fish cleaning table with water and a gas grill. Follow a few steps up to the first level where you will find the laundry room and two outdoor showers. Inside you'll find the den with great views of the ocean, large flat screen TV with BluRay player and sofa bed. Also on this level are three bedrooms; 1 master bedroom with private bath and ocean view and 2 bedrooms that share a full hall bath. The top level is home to the great room with large flat screen TV, BluRay player, access to the wraparound deck for outstanding views of the surf and sound and the bright kitchen with bar seating. Also find a convenient half bath and a second master bedroom with private bath on this level. Each bedroom in the home has its own flat screen TV. You can be ABSOLUTELY SHORE to relax at the end of a long beach day at this lovely home. | (2 masters) 1 queen, 1 queen, 1 double and 1 single, 1 pyramid bunk and 1 single, 1 sofa bed (den) | Non-smoking - 2nd Refrigerator (in laundry room) - 7 TVs - 2 BluRay players - Free long distance calling (in continental US) - Fireplace - electric - Grill - gas - 2 Outdoor showers -Electronic keyless door lock - Wireless high-speed internet access -Linens and towels available for rent - click for details -14' x 28' Private saltwater swimming pool (no heat available) with Tiki bar - 6 Person hot tub - Pets not permitted |
